personal_summary: Accomplished Product leader with over 10 years of experience driving AI-powered SaaS innovation. Proven success in launching scalable products, improving engagement and retention, and leading cross-functional teams to deliver measurable business impact.

professional_experience.title: Product Manager
responsibilities: Launched Nebula.io, an all-in-one AI recruitment SaaS platform that combines Sourcing, Engagement, and ATS functionality.
Led a cross-functional team of 8, including Data Scientists, Engineers, and Designers, overseeing Agile ceremonies and roadmap strategies.
Delivered NLP-based talent search experience, leading to a 2x increase in quality results and 50% reduction in customer churn.
Led RLHF fine-tuning initiative, enhancing model performance through feedback collection and internal leaderboards.
Developed an AI chatbot for automated outreach, increasing candidate response rates and talent pipeline additions.

professional_experience.title: Engineering Manager
responsibilities: Managed a distributed team of 10 engineers to build and launch AVA, an AI-powered internal recruitment platform.
Implemented NLP, vector search, and automated LLM engagement features, reducing time-to-fill rates and generating $1MM in ARR.
Collaborated with leadership to align product milestones with business goals and implemented Agile processes, increasing team velocity by 25%.

professional_experience.title: Frontend Engineer
responsibilities: Led UI development for a talent acquisition platform using React, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
Directed the migration effort from AngularJS to React, maintaining component libraries and state management.

professional_experience.title: Frontend Engineer
responsibilities: Developed FinTech software for small businesses using AngularJS, JavaScript, and Node.js.
Collaborated with a team of 8, including Business Analysts, Engineers, and Designers.
